sentence: niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine das'āhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabbaṃ, taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
grammar: nt loc sg of niṭṭhitacīvara, comp
meaning: when the robe-cloth is complete; when the robe is finished

grammar: adv, acc sg of dasāhaparama, comp

meaning: offence requiring confession, offence involving expiation

sentence: niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine das'āhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabbaṃ, taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pali_1: When the robe is finished by a monk, (and) when the kaṭhina privilege is withdrawn, for ten days at the most extra robe can be kept.  For one exceeding that, there is an offence requiring relinquishment and confession.
